title: HYDERABAD POLO AND RIDING CLUB - Apply For Membership
text: HYDERABAD POLO AND RIDING CLUB - Apply For Membership +91 – 9177 00 00 56 info@hprc.co.in Member Login Pay Now toggle navigation Home About us Who We Are Mission Vision Values Managing Committee Start Riding About Riding Packages Beginners Riding Programme Intermediate Riding Programme Advanced Riding Programme Polo Equestrian Polo About Polo Stick & Ball Chukkers Events Past Events Upcoming Events SPORTS CENTRE Tennis Badminton Squash Swimming pool Basketball Futsal Gym Sauna Upcoming SportS Event Packages Gold Package Platinum Package RESTAURANTS Chukkers Snaffles Bistro BANQUETS Membership Events & Media Photo Gallery Video Gallery News Events Newsletters Blogs Contact Us Apply For Membership Membership Apply For Membership Membership Hyderabad Polo and Riding Club has four kinds of Membership. Associate Member, Lady Member, Temporary Member and Student Member. The charges and eligibility are given below: Particulars Type of Membership & Fees Associate Lady Temporary Student Corpus Fund Rs. 10,00,000 Rs. 5,00,000 Rs. 2,50,000 Rs. 3,00,000 Annual Subscription Rs. 12,000 Rs. 12,000 Rs. 12,000 Rs. 10,000 Dependant's Subscription per (head/PA) Rs. 1,000 NA Rs. 1,000 NA Particulars Eligibility Dependants Dependants Subscription ASSOCIATE MEMBERSHIP 21 years & above Spouse & Children(Children below 21 years of age only) Rs. 1180/- per Dependant per annum; Riding & other fee remain same LADY MEMBERSHIP 21 years & above NA NA TEMPORARY MEMBERSHIP 21 years & above(3 years validity) Spouse & Children (Children below 21 years of age only) Rs. 1180/- per Dependant per annum; Riding & other fee remain same. STUDENT MEMBERSHIP Below 21 years (Associate Membership will be offered on payment of the difference of the then Enrolment Fee on attaining 21 years.) Fill out the form & we'll be in touch soon! reason: The page contains detailed information about membership types, fees, eligibility, and an application form, indicating that its primary purpose is to inform and facilitate membership sign-ups for the Hyderabad Polo and Riding Club.
